name: theia-yang-extension
description: An extension for Theia connection language support for the Yang DSL
author: Project Theia

scripts.prepare: yarn run clean && yarn run copy:languageserver && yarn run build
scripts.copy:languageserver: rm -rf ./build && mkdir build && cp -r ../../yang-lsp/yang-lsp/io.typefox.yang.diagram/build/install/yang-language-server ./build || echo 'Could not copy yang-lsp, make sure it sits next to the yangster repo, and that you executed `./gradlew installDist`.'
